Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking out the trash and a bright object in the western sky got my attention. Appeared to be diamond shaped. Alternating red and white (brilliant). Stayed low on the horizon, somewhat stationary for 5 min and then got dim and moved off further west toward Oklahoma. When I went in to get my wife, it had already started to move off. The neighbors dog was barking during this time.
